short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add annotations on your emails to remember something, or to coach how to craft a good email.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If emails were letters, Notes for Gmail™ by cloudHQ would be sticky post-it notes. 

Highlight a section of an email that you received, and make a note about it. Keep it for yourself or email it to someone else. 
The notes are embedded directly within your email message and stored on Google Gmail™ servers, allowing you to view them on your mobile phone as well.

No more having to respond to someone by saying "see edits below in red", or wishing that you could write a note on an email. Now, you can just use Notes for Gmail™ by cloudHQ and never lose a thought. 

It is also useful to add information to your email message, such as the project ID or customer ID, so you can easily search for that email.

Perfect for:
✔️ Lawyers
✔️ Assistants
✔️ Editors
✔️ Sales Managers
✔️ Project Managers
✔️ Customer Representatives
✔️ Anyone who wants to make a mental note about an email that they received. 

cloudHQ. Helping your productivity, 1 click at a time.

cloudHQ Website: https://www.cloudhq.net
App Website: https://www.gmail-notes.com/
Pricing:  https://www.gmail-notes.com/pricing
Support page: https://support.cloudhq.net/category/browser-extensions/gmail-notes/
